mapper.select: SELECT e.resSeq, e.resType, e.resName, e.resOpen, e.resClose, e.resTel, e.resEAdress, e.resParkingNy, e.resReservationNy, e.resColchageNy, e.resAbout, e.resDelNy, e.resRegist, e.resEdit FROM bears.restaurant e ORDER BY e.resSeq desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO restaurant ( resType, resName, resOpen, resClose, resTel, resEAdress, resParkingNy, resReservationNy, resColchageNy, resAbout, resDelNy, resRegist, resEdit ) values ( #{resType}, #{resName}, #{resOpen}, #{resClose}, #{resTel}, #{resEAdress}, #{resParkingNy}, #{resReservationNy}, #{resColchageNy}, #{resAbout}, #{resDelNy}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT e.resSeq, e.resType, e.resName, e.resOpen, e.resClose, e.resTel, e.resEAdress, e.resParkingNy, e.resReservationNy, e.resColchageNy, e.resAbout, e.resDelNy, e.resRegist, e.resEdit FROM bears.restaurant e WHERE 1 = 1 AND e.resSeq = #{resSeq}
